summary: The story of New Zealand's Robert "Rob" Edwin Hall, who on May 10, 1996, together with Scott Fischer, teamed up on a joint expedition to ascend Mount Everest.
cast: Jason Clarke|Ang Phula Sherpa|Thomas M. title: Everest
